name: Kick-Ass
summary: It is the story of Dave Lizewski, a teenager who sets out to become a real life superhero. His actions are publicized on the Internet and inspire others. He gets caught up with ruthless vigilantes Hit-Girl and Big Daddy who are on a mission to take down the gangster John Genovese.
info:
• 中文名: 海扁王
  • 出版社: Icon Comics
  • 编剧: Mark Millar
  • 作画: John Romita Jr.
